about.title: Hey, I'm √áaƒüda≈ü! üëã
about.subtitle: Student & Developer
about.description: I'm passionate about exploring technology through programming, 3D design, and electronics. From building simple applications to designing 3D models and working with ESP32 microcontrollers, I enjoy learning and creating at a foundational to intermediate level.

what_i_do.title: üöÄ What I Do
what_i_do.description1: I'm a technology enthusiast who enjoys learning across multiple disciplines at a foundational to intermediate level. My journey spans basic to intermediate programming, 3D modeling, and electronics projects.
what_i_do.description2: I enjoy experimenting with microcontrollers like ESP32, creating 3D models for visualization and 3D printing, and building simple applications that solve everyday problems. Whether it's a basic automation script or a simple IoT device, I'm always eager to learn and improve my skills.

focus.title: üéØ Current Learning & Interests
focus.item1: Improving C# programming skills and learning .NET basics
focus.item2: Building Python automation scripts and simple data analysis
focus.item3: Learning mobile app development with Flutter and Dart
focus.item4: Creating basic IoT projects with ESP32 and simple sensors
focus.item5: Designing and 3D printing functional objects and enclosures
focus.item6: Exploring basic computer vision and machine learning concepts
focus.item7: Building simple electronics projects that combine hardware and software
focus.item8: Learning basic PCB design and circuit prototyping

connect.title: üì´ Let's Connect
connect.description: I'm always excited to connect with fellow learners, makers, and technology enthusiasts! Whether you want to discuss programming projects, share 3D design ideas, talk about basic electronics, or collaborate on simple IoT experiments, feel free to reach out.
